hero.heading: AI-Powered Customer Support
hero.p_1: Resolve 80% of customer support complex issues instantly across all channels.
hero.p_3: AI learns your business, speaks your brand voice.

feature_1.title: AI-Powered Resolution.
feature_1.description: Solve up to 80% of complex issues instantly. Our AI understands and resolves intricate customer queries across all channels, just like your best human agent would.

feature_2.title: Multilingual Support.
feature_2.description: Communicate in 100+ languages, including English and Arabic. Break language barriers and expand your global reach. Our AI adapts to your customers' preferred language seamlessly.

feature_3.title: Insightful Analytics.
feature_3.description: Gain deep insights into customer sentiment, common issues, and support trends to continually improve your service.

feature_4.title: Lightning-Fast Response Times.
feature_4.description: 95% reduction in wait times. Provide instant, 24/7 support to your customers, eliminating queues and enhancing satisfaction.

description.str_1: One smart inbox for all channels. Seamlessly manage interactions from WhatsApp

feature_6.title: Customizable AI Training.
feature_6.description: Tailor your AI agent to your brand. Easily train the AI with your business data, products, and brand voice - no technical expertise required.

step_1.title: 1. Upload Your Knowledge Base
step_1.description: Feed your AI with your business expertise. Simply upload your documents (PDF, Excel, Word, JSON) containing product info, FAQs, and policies. Our AI rapidly absorbs and understands your unique brand voice and offerings.

step_2.title: 2. Customize Your AI Agent
step_2.description: Fine-tune your AI's responses and behavior through our intuitive interface. Set up multilingual support, including English and Arabic, to match your global customer base. Integrate and Launch.

step_3.title: 3. Go live across all channels
step_3.description: Connect your communication channels (WhatsApp, email, SMS) with few clicks. Your AI support agent is now ready to slash costs and delight customers 24/7.
